metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0686 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in NPM url-parse prior to 1.5.8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
